front.title: CATS Reference Model for AI-Agent Communication Network

abstract.t: This draft describes the AI-agents along with the network to provide the communication services among various types of AI-agents, i.e., AI-agent Communication Network or ACN. Thanks to the CATS-like information flow steering in ACN, we propose a CATS reference model that covers the definition of reference points, protocol stacks, service provisioning model, sigaling procedures, message paths, and implementation schemes. This reference model is generalized so as to accommodate both the existing CATS framework and the potential extension for the ACN.
